analysis.description:
FriendsFingersCrowdsale.finalization (/unique_chucks/20/0xf01eab46ade80e599209681a5aaa13260ae8735c.sol#871-897) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- friendsFingersWallet.transfer(friendsFingersFee) (/unique_chucks/20/0xf01eab46ade80e599209681a5aaa13260ae8735c.sol#883-884)
	- wallet.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/20/0xf01eab46ade80e599209681a5aaa13260ae8735c.sol#885)
